name: Meowssion
description:
Catastrophe!

This is a silly SHMUP game that is mostly a prototype but does have aspects of a complete game. The game is made in the Godot engine and uses copyrighted material only for educational/personal uses and does not reflect an official or typical project of Low Stack Games.

Simply put, this game was made within 24 hours and thought up within 5 minutes. We hope you enjoy it as much as we enjoyed creating it.
